alert.note: Alert for McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 10:52PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern and central McMullen County through 1115 PM CDT... At 1050 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Tilden, moving northeast at 15 mph. Another strong thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Tilden, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tilden and Cross. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
